comment: IMO it was irresponsible of David Fisher to reveal your full name in his article . It is quite common for journalists to use only the first name of someone they have interviewed , noting last name has been withheld to protect this person s identity . It s a weird world indeed !
amr:
# ::snt IMO it was irresponsible of David Fisher to reveal your full name in his article . It is quite common for journalists to use only the first name of someone they have interviewed , noting last name has been withheld to protect this person s identity . It s a weird world indeed !
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (o / opine-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (r / responsible-02
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (r2 / reveal-01
                        :ARG0 (p / person
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "David"
                                    :op2 "Fishers"))
                        :ARG1 (n2 / name
                              :poss (y / you)
                              :mod (f / full))
                        :location (a / article
                              :poss p))))
      :snt2 (c / common
            :domain (a2 / and
                  :op1 (u / use-01
                        :ARG0 (j / journalist)
                        :ARG1 (n3 / name
                              :ord (o2 / ordinal-entity
                                    :value 1)
                              :poss (s / someone
                                    :ARG1-of (ii2 / interview-01
                                          :ARG0 j)))
                        :mod (o3 / only))
                  :op2 (n4 / note-01
                        :ARG0 j
                        :ARG1 (w / withhold-01
                              :ARG1 (n5 / name
                                    :ord (o4 / ordinal-entity
                                          :value "-1"))
                              :purpose (p2 / protect-01
                                    :ARG0 j
                                    :ARG1 (ii3 / identity
                                          :poss (p3 / person
                                                :mod (t / this))))))
                  :degree (q / quite))
            :snt3 (w2 / world
                  :mod (w3 / weird)
                  :mod (ii4 / indeed))))

comment: ournalist David Fisher is on an IG panel re security & public safety online ( as a representative of the public sphere ) ... if anyone interested in complaining
amr:

(h / have-org-role-91
      :ARG0 (p / person
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "David"

            :ARG0-of h

                        :op1 "Institute"
                        :op2 "of"

                        :op4 "Safety"))
            :ARG3 (r / represent-01
                  :ARG1 (s / sphere
                        :mod (p3 / public)))
            :ARG0-of r)
      :ARG1 (p4 / panel
            :topic (a / and
                  :op1 (s2 / security)
                  :op2 (s3 / safe-01
                        :ARG1 p3))
            :mod (o / online))
      :ARG2 p2
      :name (n3 / name
            :op1 " IG")
      :condition (ii / interest-01
            :ARG1 (a2 / anyone)
            :ARG2 (c / complain-01
                  :ARG0 a2)))
